original_title: Modern Naval Combat - The West's Fighting Ships
overview: Today's missle and helicoptor-equipped destroyers and frigates can reach further and more effectivly than even the mightiest capital ships of former years. While the capabilities of the current generation of carriers and cruisers are truly awesome. Using the pick of film from the leading navies of the western powers, this program shows the major types of vessels in action.
tagline: All action footage of the major surface combatants
title: Modern Naval Combat - The West's Fighting Ships
